main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 22 December 1957 in Herefordshire, England, involving an object described as the size of a small pen, light bluish white in color, which disappeared quickly.
interesting points: The object was compared to a Verey pistol,The sighting duration was approximately 5 seconds,Multiple theories regarding the object included it possibly being a balloon, satellite, aircraft, or astronomical meteor, The report mentions that phenomena resembling balloons or fireballs are common at this time of year, There was no photograph taken during the sighting.
sighted object: an object the size of a small pen, light bluish white in color
witness description: The observer described the object as small and light bluish white.
